gate.event

Interface ProgressListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Handle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractController.IntervalProgressListener, AbstractProcessingResource.IntervalProgressListener, JapeViewer, MainFrame, NameBearerHandle, ProgressListenerAdaptor, ProgressPrinter, SerialControllerEditor.InternalProgressListener

    public interface ProgressListener
extends EventListener
    This interface describes objects that can register themselves as listeners to ProcessProgressReporters. They need to be able to handle progress change and process finished events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processFinished()
      Called when the process is finished.
      void progressChanged(int i)
      Called when the progress has changed
